text: hey men sorry for the ping haha but you might forgot :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing: <@U25PYL3Q8>
yo, can we set up a meeting for tomorrow? I think I’m a bit confused on what I should send you
What I think you need to do is follow this kind of layout — where you populate the blog posts into a javascript object
this code example is pulling in from hubd and blogs, so you wouldn’t need all of this
but you would create this in the html section inside a <script> tag and you are basicaly pulling in hubl/blog stuff into an object
then you would need to loop through the items and pull in X amount of posts, wiht an offset each time you load the next set
on the / so that would be handled
you just need to change the logic to suit your use cases if you want to do other things.
alright thanks! I'll review this one first. really appreciated men! :slightly_smiling_face:
